name: I N V A D E R
name_original: I N V A D E R
description:
Survive for as long as you can as you're stuck in a wormhole with a broken FTL drive, perpetually gaining speed and encountering unknown hostile lasershootin-life.

Kill time while waiting for a friend. Played in command console.

CONTROLS:

W / Up Arrow = Move Up

A / Left Arrow = Move Left

S / Down Arrow = Move Down

D / Right Arrow = Move Right

Spacebar = Shoot

_____________________________________________

I made this as a challenge for myself to make a game in C# in 1 night that can be played in command console.
